üì≤ Add to Home Screen

Install the app on your phone for quick access - no app store needed! It works offline and loads instantly.
iPhone (Safari):
1. Open Safari and go to tennis.sportsconnector.com/ttmd
2. Tap the Share button (square with arrow at bottom)
3. Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
4. Tap "Add" in the top right

Android (Chrome):
1. Open Chrome and go to tennis.sportsconnector.com/ttmd
2. Tap the menu (three dots in top right)
3. Tap "Add to Home Screen" or "Install App"
4. Tap "Add" to confirm
Works like a native app - launches full-screen from your home screen
